import React, { Component } from 'react'; import * as config from '../../constants/config'; class InvoiceDetails extends Component { render() { var {order} = this.props; return (
Bác sỹ: {order.user.firstname + ' ' + order.user.lastname} ({order.category.title})
Email: {order.user.email}
Điện thoại: {order.user.phone}
Bệnh nhân: {order.customer.firstname + ' ' + order.customer.lastname}
Email: {order.customer.email}
Điện thoại: {order.customer.phone}
Địa chỉ: {order.customer.address}
Giới tính: {order.customer.gender === config.GENDER_MALE ? 'Nữ' : 'Nam'}
# Item Description Unit Cost Qty Total
1 Origin License Extended License $999,00 1 $999,00
2 Custom Services Instalation and Customization (cost per hour) $150,00 20 $3.000,00
3 Hosting 1 year subcription $499,00 1 $499,00
4 Platinum Support 1 year subcription 24/7 $3.999,00 1 $3.999,00
Subtotal $8.497,00
Discount (20%) $1,699,40
VAT (10%) $679,76
Total $7.477,36
); } } export default InvoiceDetails;
